Question:

B.-1
C.0
D.2

we have that

-\dfrac{1}{-3}\cdot\cfrac{1}{~\frac{1}{-3}~} &= -\dfrac{1}{-3}}\cdot\cfrac{1}{~1~}}\\

&= \boxed{1}.
\end{align*}
